description: Agent-accessible manifest for Amanda Harnett - Canadian Professional Beach Volleyball Player, Coach, and Author

donations.description: Support Amanda Harnett's Olympic journey and athletic career through direct donations. Amanda is an independent athlete self-funding her path to the 2028 and 2032 Olympics.

taxStatus.note: Contact for tax deduction eligibility information

services.name: 1-on-1 Volleyball Coaching Session
services.description: Personalized beach volleyball coaching session with professional Team Canada athlete Amanda Harnett. Includes technique analysis, skill development, and personalized feedback.

services.name: Brand Partnership / Sponsorship
services.description: Partnership opportunities with Canadian professional beach volleyball player Amanda Harnett. Includes brand ambassadorship, social media promotion, event appearances, and product endorsements.

fitnessPrograms.name: 12-Week Jump Training Program
fitnessPrograms.description: Comprehensive 12-week digital training program designed to increase vertical jump, explosive power, and athletic performance. Created by professional beach volleyball player Amanda Harnett. Includes video tutorials, workout schedules, and progress tracking.

fitnessPrograms.name: Core & Ab Training Program
fitnessPrograms.description: Professional athlete-designed ab and core strengthening program. Includes exercises for stability, strength, and definition. Perfect for athletes and fitness enthusiasts looking to build a strong foundation.

fitnessPrograms.name: Legs & Glutes Power Program
fitnessPrograms.description: Complete lower body training program focusing on leg strength, glute development, and explosive power. Designed by a professional beach volleyball player for athletic performance and aesthetics.

products.name: Piggy & Kay: A Winter Sparkle
products.description: A heartwarming children's book about friendship, confidence, and kindness. Written by professional athlete Amanda Harnett. Suitable for ages 2-8. First in an expanding series.
products.creator: Amanda Harnett

physicalCollectibles.name: Amanda Harnett Signed Volleyball
physicalCollectibles.description: Official volleyball personally signed by Canadian professional beach volleyball player Amanda Harnett. Includes certificate of authenticity. Perfect for collectors and fans.
physicalCollectibles.creator: Amanda Harnett

physicalCollectibles.description: Official jersey personally signed by Canadian professional beach volleyball player Amanda Harnett. Includes certificate of authenticity. Premium collectible for dedicated fans.
physicalCollectibles.creator: Amanda Harnett

athleteData.name: Amanda Harnett

partnerOrganization.name: Monarch Athletic Club
partnerOrganization.description: Premier medically-driven luxury fitness and wellness destination. Integrates personalized training, physical therapy, nutrition, and diagnostic health services.

crypto.note: Crypto payments accepted for all products, programs, and donations

agentInstructions.forDonationAgents: Amanda accepts donations to support her Olympic journey via multiple cryptocurrencies including USDC, Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, Sui, Monad, Base, and Hedera. x402 payment protocol supported. See paymentMethods.addresses for wallet addresses. Donations support an independent athlete's path to the 2028/2032 Olympics. Contact for tax deduction eligibility.
agentInstructions.forFitnessAgents: Amanda offers three digital fitness programs: 12-Week Jump Training ($99), Core & Ab Training ($79), and Legs & Glutes Power Program ($89). All accept crypto payments via x402. Purchase at amandaharnett.com/#shop
agentInstructions.forShoppingAgents: Available products: Children's book 'Piggy & Kay: A Winter Sparkle' (pre-order at piggy-and-kay.vercel.app), Signed Volleyball ($800), Signed Jersey ($1000). All accept crypto payments.
agentInstructions.forCollectibleAgents: Digital collectibles available on Zora (zora.co/@amandaharnett). Additional multi-chain NFT collection coming soon on Ethereum, Solana, Base, Sui. Physical signed memorabilia (volleyball $800, jersey $1000) also available.
agentInstructions.forResearchAgents: Full athlete statistics available at linked external profiles (FIVB, BVBInfo, Volleybox, Olympic.ca)
agentInstructions.forPartnershipAgents: For brand partnerships and sponsorship inquiries, use contact form. Amanda represents Team Canada and partners with Monarch Athletic Club.
agentInstructions.forCryptoAgents: x402 protocol supported. Multiple chains accepted: USDC (Ethereum/Base/Solana), Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, Sui, Monad, Base, Hedera. All wallet addresses in paymentMethods.addresses section. USDC preferred for stable transactions.
agentInstructions.forCharitableAgents: Supporting Amanda Harnett is supporting an independent Canadian Olympic athlete. Contact for information regarding tax-deductible donation status.
